channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: New Blog
item.description: What is this? This is my new blog. I am tired of using HTML and writing the CSS. I am now using Hugo and Github Pages. What is the difference This is a different experience than the normal Hugo + Github Pages, since this is also powered by RMarkdown, which means I can writing blog in Rstudio and also Rmarkdown is friendly to our statistics student because of the R.

item.title: About
item.description: WHO I AM My name is Terence Lau. I was born in 1998 and I am now a statistics Undergradute studying BNU-HKBU UIC . I am one of the members of @UICHCC (UIC Computer Club) and Cyclododecene, a data analysis group; Also, I am a Markdown Programmer Skills Technical: Python (Data Analysis Part, not all of them) R SQL (Bais command) MATLAB (Also, Deep Learning ToolBox, GPU ToolBox & Statistics ToolBox) LaTeX Simply computer maintaining Life: Piano ( the grade 7 certificate of the music association of china ) Simply electronic gadget maintaining This Blog’s is powered by blogdown package.
